name: DreamCatcher
0:
”Alexa, ask DreamCatcher to arm away”
”Alexa, ask DreamCatcher to arm stay”
”Alexa, ask DreamCatcher to record video”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dream catcher
des:
With the DreamCatcher skill, you are able to control your alarm system and camera using your voice.
With the skill you can:
“Alexa, ask DreamCatcher to arm away”
“Alexa, ask DreamCatcher to arm stay”
“Alexa, ask DreamCatcher to disarm with PIN ****”
“Alexa, ask DreamCatcher to record video”
“Alexa, ask DreamCatcher to turn on Privacy Mode with PIN ****”
“Alexa, ask DreamCatcher to turn off Privacy Mode with PIN ****”
 and more to come...
Notice:
For security consideration, we don’t offer Disarming function (for alarm) and Turning Off Privacy Mode (for camera) for the voice control.
